dialog.text: I am knackered :sleeping:  Did a double shift at work delivering all over the Highlands over the weekend, could do with just going to bed.  How you doing?

Was chatting with Jeff earlier and he said he was getting really bored as he has done all this web stuff before.  I am completely lost!  I did catch up with Jordan and he talked me through some of the learning outcomes.  I kinda get it but I guess I will just have to figure it out.  Have you managed to do any tasks in your project yet?
If you find anything good on LinkedIn Learning, let me know as I am really struggling with this web stuff.  Catch you later!
